info.name: Medivoy Healthcare API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection with all endpoints and comprehensive documentation

request.description:

Create a new appointment in the system. Validates all required fields and returns the created resource. 

**Use Cases:**
- Patients scheduling new appointments
- Doctors managing their appointment calendar
- Administrative staff handling bookings
- System sending appointment reminders
